param.name: published
param.label: Publish
param.description: Select publish status of this location. Unpublished action will not display.

param.name: value
param.label: Action
param.description: Input the location. Location will determine the users location relationship (e.g. At, In, Going To, etc...).

param.name: title
param.label: Title
param.description: Optionally input the location title. The title is displayed as a prefix to the location (e.g. at, in, going to, arriving at, etc...).

param.name: url
param.label: URL
param.description: Optionally input the location map url. This will override the built in Google Maps URL. To have no URL set this to none. Additionally you can substitute in address and place with [address] and [place]. Note if no address is supplied then address will substitute in place instead.

param.name: ordering
param.label: Ordering
param.description: Select the ordering of this location. Ordering determines what order the location displays in the dropdown.
